short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use ChatGPT as you browse the web. Get useful info about the pages you're viewing. Think of it as your personal browser assistant

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AskChatGPT integrates ChatGPT with your browser, allowing you to ask questions and get information about the pages you're browsing. Creative prompts streamline research and provide you with the info you need quicker.
